G

getDate(JSONObject) - Method in class Job1.Parser
Gets the date where the tweet is created
getEnglishStopwordList() - Method in class Job1.Parser
Getter Method for english stopwords list
getGermanStopwordList() - Method in class Job1.Parser
Getter Method for german stopwords list
getHashtags(JSONObject) - Method in class Job1.Parser
Extracts the hashtags from exactly one tweet
getLanguage(JSONObject) - Method in class Job1.Parser
Extracts the machine determined language of exactly one tweet
getSpanishStopwordList() - Method in class Job1.Parser
Getter Method for spanish stopwords list
getText(JSONObject) - Method in class Job1.Parser
Extracts the actual text from exactly one tweet, during this only useful words will be extracted.

J

Job1 - package Job1
 
Job2 - package Job2
 
Job3 - package Job3
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class WordCount
Starts the jobs in a specific order (job2 and job3 have to wait for job1 and than can be started parallel)
map(Object, Text, Mapper<Object, Text, Text, IntWritable>.Context) - Method in class Job1.TokenMapper
Maps a value to a IntWritable
map(Text, IntWritable, Mapper<Text, IntWritable, Text, IntWritable>.Context) - Method in class Job2.TokenMapper1
Maps the data using delimiters to only use part of a string
map(Text, IntWritable, Mapper<Text, IntWritable, Text, IntWritable>.Context) - Method in class Job3.TokenMapper2
Maps the data using delimiters to only use part of a string

P

Parser - Class in Job1
This class is used to extract Information from a tweet, which is needed for the map-reduce in Job1
Parser() - Constructor for class Job1.Parser
Constructor which reads stopwords lists in so they can be used instantly.

R

reduce(Text, Iterable<IntWritable>, Reducer<Text, IntWritable, Text, IntWritable>.Context) - Method in class Job1.SumReducer
Reduces all values.
reduce(Text, Iterable<IntWritable>, Reducer<Text, IntWritable, Text, IntWritable>.Context) - Method in class Job2.SumReducer1
Reduces the data to those combinations that occur more than a 100 times
reduce(Text, Iterable<IntWritable>, Reducer<Text, IntWritable, Text, IntWritable>.Context) - Method in class Job3.SumReducer2
Reduces the data to those combinations that occur more than 50 times
removeAllStopWords(String) - Method in class Job1.Parser
Removes all stopwords @{https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stop_word)} from a String

S

SumReducer - Class in Job1
Reduces the data from TokenMapper
SumReducer() - Constructor for class Job1.SumReducer
 
SumReducer1 - Class in Job2
Reduces the data coming from TokenMapper1
SumReducer1() - Constructor for class Job2.SumReducer1
 
SumReducer2 - Class in Job3

T

TokenMapper - Class in Job1
Maps word#hashtag#lanuage#date with a 1
TokenMapper() - Constructor for class Job1.TokenMapper
 
TokenMapper1 - Class in Job2
Maps the output of SumReducer to the combination hashtag#word IntWritable
TokenMapper1() - Constructor for class Job2.TokenMapper1
 
TokenMapper2 - Class in Job3
Maps the data coming from job1
TokenMapper2() - Constructor for class Job3.TokenMapper2
 

W

WordCount - Class in <Unnamed>
Main class which is responsible for executing the MapReduce jobs
